query:
ALTER TABLE documents 
  ADD COLUMN tenantId INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER id,
  ADD COLUMN validationStatus VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending' AFTER fileSize,
  ADD COLUMN createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER validationResult;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Ljv7tUcUqkJWz2.a9fc2ac34f70 --database Q4zKBZCPW5Fmg3HtsHcjY8 --execute ALTER TABLE documents 
  ADD COLUMN tenantId INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER id,
  ADD COLUMN validationStatus VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending' AFTER fileSize,
  ADD COLUMN createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AFTER validationResult;
